subject: Getting TestResult from TestRunner in Eclipse
msgSnippet: Hallo, I want to write the daily testresults and logfiles from JUnit and HttpUnit into a testcase database. Thats means run tests, write log, connect database.
messageBody:
Hallo,
I want to write the daily testresults and logfiles from JUnit and HttpUnit
into a testcase database.
Thats means run tests, write log, connect database. But in Eclipse run the
tests twice, because the JUnit plugin gets the suite and
let them run. When I choice "Run as Application" in Eclipse the tests run
once, but I loose the GUI-Information from JUnit-Plugin.
How do I get the TestResult object from Testrunner to participate the
results that I need to archive? Overload run (but how an where)? Wrap suite
(but how an where)?

Thanks for help!
Thomas

public class T8TDHttpTestMain extends TestCase {

static {
T8TDConnector TDCo = new T8TDConnector(); // my connection
class
TDCo.runTest(suite(),"T8TDHttpTestMain"); // do
"suite.run(testresult);" and
// log and write to
DB.
}

public static void main( String args[] ) {
// ... not important
}

public static Test suite() {
TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
suite.addTestSuite(T8TDHttpTestDrv.class);
return suite;
}

}
